Mod.Name: [Tsunamods] OST-RF - Arranged Soundtrack
Mod.Author: MikeDoesAudio, Final Fantasy & Chill
Mod.Description: - OST-RF (Original Soundtrack Refinement) - The only complete reorchestration of the entire Final Fantasy VIII score. Done by 1 person, in the same studio for a consistent and immersive experience. - Suggested Volume - 60

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: - Blue Sky - Refined Mix - Don't Be Afraid - Refined Mix - The Other Winner - Alternate victory music added for Laguna battles - Force Your Way - Refined Mix - The Landing - Refined Mix - The Landing (No Intro) - Refined Mix - Okeda ke Chocobo - Looping issue fixes - Premonition - Refined Mix - Succession of Witches - Refined Mix - Tell me - Refined Mix - The Mission - Refined Mix - The Oath - Refined Mix
